name: Witlab.github.io
body: WitLab's Gists ================ ## 1. BarbeQR is a set of sample Java codes that write image files of barcodes, and QR codes. ### HTML * ![CodaBar Barcode](./BarbeQR/codabar-123456789.png) * ![Code128 Barcode](./BarbeQR/code128-123456789.png) * ![Code39 Barcode](./BarbeQR/code39-123456789.png) * ![QR Code Barcode](./BarbeQR/qrcode-123456789.png) * ![QR Code With Japanese Text](BarbeQR/qrcodeShiftJisJapanese-123456789.png) ### Java Source Files * ZXingEncoder class encodes the barcode content string and writes a PNG file. [ZXingEncoder.java](https://gist.github.com/witlab/6e62441333410e3fd65d) * ZXingDecoder class reads a PNG file with a barcode / QR code, and decodes it to a string value. [ZxingDecoder.java](https://gist.github.com/witlab/4aedde8fa566229bbeee) * TestZXingEncoderDecoder is a JUnit class to test ZXingEncode and ZXingDecoder classes. [TestZXingEncoderDecoder.java](https://gist.github.com/witlab/5ec411ee74c4409d0b7e) ### Dependencies * ZXing http://code.google.com/p/zxing/ -------------
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
